Typealiases.html#/s:8TinkLink16RetryCanc.name: RetryCancellable
Typealiases.html#/s:8TinkLink16RetryCanc.abstract: A type that represents something that can be retried and cancelled.

Structs/ScopeDescription.html#/s:8TinkLi.name: title
Structs/ScopeDescription.html#/s:8TinkLi.abstract: The short string of what access the scope is for.

Structs/ScopeDescription.html#/s:8TinkLi.name: description
Structs/ScopeDescription.html#/s:8TinkLi.abstract: A string describing what user data the scope provides access to.

Structs/ProviderTree/CredentialKindNode..name: CredentialKindNode
Structs/ProviderTree/CredentialKindNode..abstract: A parent node of the tree structure, with a Provider as it’s leaf node.

Structs/ProviderTree/AccessTypeNode.html.name: AccessTypeNode
Structs/ProviderTree/AccessTypeNode.html.abstract: A parent node of the tree structure, with a list of either CredentialKindNode children or a single Provider.

Structs/ProviderTree/FinancialInstitutio.name: FinancialInstitutionNode
Structs/ProviderTree/FinancialInstitutio.abstract: A parent node of the tree structure, with a list of either AccessTypeNode, CredentialKindNode children or a single Provider.

Structs/ProviderTree/FinancialInstitutio.name: FinancialInstitutionGroupNode
Structs/ProviderTree/FinancialInstitutio.abstract: A parent node of the tree structure, with a list of either FinancialInstitutionNode, AccessTypeNode, CredentialKindNode children or a single Provider.

Structs/Market.html#/s:8TinkLink6MarketV.name: localizedString
Structs/Market.html#/s:8TinkLink6MarketV.abstract: Returns a localized string for a specified region code.

Structs/Form/ValidationError.html#/s:8Ti.name: errors
Structs/Form/ValidationError.html#/s:8Ti.abstract: Describes one or more field validation errors.

Structs/Form/ValidationError.html#/s:8Ti.name: subscript(fieldName:)
Structs/Form/ValidationError.html#/s:8Ti.abstract: Accesses the validation error associated with the given field.

Structs/Form/Field/ValidationError.html#.name: invalid(fieldName:reason:)
Structs/Form/Field/ValidationError.html#.abstract: Field’s text was invalid. See reason for explanation why.

Structs/Form/Field/ValidationError.html#.name: errorDescription
Structs/Form/Field/ValidationError.html#.abstract: An error message describing what is the reason for the validation failure.

Structs/Form/Field/Attributes/InputType..name: default
Structs/Form/Field/Attributes/InputType..abstract: An input type suitable for normal text input.

Structs/Form/Field/Attributes/InputType..name: numeric
Structs/Form/Field/Attributes/InputType..abstract: An input type suitable for e.g. PIN entry.

Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.name: description
Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.abstract: A string to display next to the field to explain what the field is for.

Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.name: placeholder
Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.abstract: A string to display when there is no other text in the text field.

Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.name: helpText
Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.abstract: A string to display next to the field with information about what the user should enter in the text field.

Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.name: isSecureTextEntry
Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.abstract: Identifies whether the text object should hide the text being entered.

Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.name: inputType
Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.abstract: The input type associated with the field.

Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.name: isEditable
Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html#/s:8T.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the field can be edited.

Structs/Form/Field/ValidationRules.html#.name: isOptional
Structs/Form/Field/ValidationRules.html#.abstract: If true the field is not required to have text for the field to be valid.

Structs/Form/Field.html#/s:8TinkLink4For.name: text
Structs/Form/Field.html#/s:8TinkLink4For.abstract: The current text input of the field. Update this to reflect the user’s input.

Structs/Form/Field.html#/s:8TinkLink4For.name: validationRules
Structs/Form/Field.html#/s:8TinkLink4For.abstract: The validation rules that determines whether the text property is valid.

Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html.name: Attributes
Structs/Form/Field/Attributes.html.abstract: Attributes to apply to a UI element that will represent a field.

Structs/Form/Field.html#/s:8TinkLink4For.name: isValid
Structs/Form/Field.html#/s:8TinkLink4For.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the field is valid.

Structs/Form/Fields.html#/s:8TinkLink4Fo.name: subscript(name:)
Structs/Form/Fields.html#/s:8TinkLink4Fo.abstract: Accesses the field associated with the given field for reading and writing.

Structs/Form.html#/s:8TinkLink4FormV14ar.name: areFieldsValid
Structs/Form.html#/s:8TinkLink4FormV14ar.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether every field in the form are valid.

Structs/Form/Field.html.name: Field
Structs/Form/Field.html.abstract: A Field represent one specific input (usually a text field) that the user need to enter in order to add a credential.

Structs/Form.html#/s:8TinkLink4FormV8pro.name: init(provider:)
Structs/Form.html#/s:8TinkLink4FormV8pro.abstract: Creates a form for the given provider.

Structs/Form.html#/s:8TinkLink4FormV11cr.name: init(credentials:)
Structs/Form.html#/s:8TinkLink4FormV11cr.abstract: Creates a form for the given credentials.

Structs/Provider/Status.html#/s:8TinkLin.name: unknown
Structs/Provider/Status.html#/s:8TinkLin.abstract: The status of the provider is unknown.

Structs/Provider/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLink8.name: unknown
Structs/Provider/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLink8.abstract: The kind of the provider is unknown.

Structs/Provider/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLink8.name: excludingTest
Structs/Provider/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLink8.abstract: A set of all providers kinds except for the test providers.

Structs/Provider/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLink8.name: all
Structs/Provider/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLink8.abstract: A set of all providers kinds. Note that this also includes test providers.

Structs/Provider/Kind.html.name: Kind
Structs/Provider/Kind.html.abstract: Indicates what kind of financial institution the provider represents.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: kind
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: Indicates what kind of financial institution the provider represents.

Structs/Provider/Status.html.name: Status
Structs/Provider/Status.html.abstract: Indicates the current status of a provider.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: status
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: Indicates the current status of the provider.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: credentialsKind
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: When creating a new credentials connected to the provider this will be the credential’s kind.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: helpText
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: Short description of how to authenticate when creating a new credentials for connected to the provider.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: isPopular
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: Indicates if the provider is popular. This is normally set to true for the biggest financial institutions on a market.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: groupDisplayName
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: A display name for providers which are branches of a bigger group.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: image
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: A URL to an image representing the provider.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: displayDescription
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: Short displayable description of the authentication type used.

Structs/Provider/Capabilities.html.name: Capabilities
Structs/Provider/Capabilities.html.abstract: Indicates what a provider is capable of.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: capabilities
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: Indicates what this provider is capable of, in terms of financial data it can aggregate and if it can execute payments.

Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.name: accessType
Structs/Provider.html#/s:8TinkLink8Provi.abstract: What Tink uses to access the data.

Structs/Provider/FinancialInstitution.ht.name: FinancialInstitution
Structs/Provider/FinancialInstitution.ht.abstract: The FinancialInstitution model represents a financial institution.

Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.name: downloadTitle
Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.abstract: Title of the app to be downloaded.

Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.name: downloadMessage
Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.abstract: Detailed message about app to be downloaded.

Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.name: upgradeTitle
Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.abstract: Title of the app to be upgraded.

Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.name: upgradeMessage
Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.abstract: Detailed message about app to be upgraded

Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.name: appStoreURL
Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.abstract: URL to AppStore where the app can be downloaded on iOS.

Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.name: scheme
Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.abstract: Base scheme of the app on iOS.

Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.name: deepLinkURL
Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.abstract: URL that the app should open on iOS. Can be of another scheme than app scheme.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.name: authenticating
Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: The credentials is in the process of authenticating.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.name: updating
Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: The credentials is done authenticating and is updating accounts and transactions.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.name: updated
Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: The credentials has finished authenticating and updating accounts and transactions.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.name: temporaryError
Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: There was a temporary error, see statusPayload for text describing the error.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.name: authenticationError
Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: There was an authentication error, see statusPayload for text describing the error.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.name: permanentError
Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: There was a permanent error, see statusPayload for text describing the error.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.name: awaitingMobileBankIDAuthentication
Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: The credentials is awaiting authentication with Mobile BankID.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.name: awaitingThirdPartyAppAuthentication
Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: The credentials is awaiting authentication with a third party app.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.name: sessionExpired
Structs/Credentials/Status.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: The credentials’ session has expired, check sessionExpiryDate to see when it expired.

Structs/Credentials/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLi.name: password
Structs/Credentials/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLi.abstract: The user will authenticate the credentials with a password.

Structs/Credentials/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLi.name: mobileBankID
Structs/Credentials/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLi.abstract: The user will authenticate the credentials with Mobile BankID.

Structs/Credentials/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLi.name: keyfob
Structs/Credentials/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLi.abstract: The user will authenticate the credentials with a Key Fob.

Structs/Credentials/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLi.name: thirdPartyAuthentication
Structs/Credentials/Kind.html#/s:8TinkLi.abstract: The user will authenticate the credentials with a third party app.

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.name: providerID
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.abstract: The provider (financial institution) that the credentials is connected to.

Structs/Credentials/Kind.html.name: Kind
Structs/Credentials/Kind.html.abstract: Indicates how Tink authenticates the user to a financial institution.

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.name: kind
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.abstract: Indicates how Tink authenticates the user to the financial institution.

Structs/Credentials/Status.html.name: Status
Structs/Credentials/Status.html.abstract: The status indicates the state of a credentials.

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.name: status
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.abstract: The status indicates the state of a credentials. For some states there are actions which need to be performed on the credentials.

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.name: statusPayload
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.abstract: A user-friendly message connected to the status. Could be an error message or text describing what is currently going on in the refresh process.

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.name: statusUpdated
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.abstract: A timestamp of when the credentials’ status was last modified.

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.name: updated
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.abstract: A timestamp of when the credentials was the last time in status .updated.

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.name: fields
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.abstract: This is a key-value map of Field name and value found on the Provider to which the credentials belongs to.

Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.name: ThirdPartyAppAuthentication
Structs/Credentials/ThirdPartyAppAuthent.abstract: Information about the third party authentication app.

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.name: thirdPartyAppAuthentication
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.abstract: Information about the third party authentication flow.

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.name: sessionExpiryDate
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:8TinkLink11C.abstract: Indicates when the session of credentials with access type Provider.AccessType.openBanking will expire. After this date automatic refreshes will not be possible without new authentication from the user.

Structs/AuthorizationCode.html.name: AuthorizationCode
Structs/AuthorizationCode.html.abstract: An authorization code from the Tink backend.

Structs/Credentials.html.name: Credentials
Structs/Credentials.html.abstract: The credentials model represents users connected providers from where financial data is accessed.

Structs/Provider.html.name: Provider
Structs/Provider.html.abstract: The provider model represents financial institutions to where Tink can connect. It specifies how Tink accesses the financial institution, metadata about the financialinstitution, and what financial information that can be accessed.

Structs/Form.html.name: Form
Structs/Form.html.abstract: A Form is used to determine what a user needs to input in order to proceed. For example it could be a username and a password field.

Structs/Market.html.name: Market
Structs/Market.html.abstract: Represents a market by a two-letter country code.

Structs/ProviderTree.html.name: ProviderTree
Structs/ProviderTree.html.abstract: Use the ProviderTree to group providers by financial institution, access type and credentials kind.

Structs/ScopeDescription.html.name: ScopeDescription
Structs/ScopeDescription.html.abstract: A title and description explaining a specific scope.

Protocols/Cancellable.html.name: Cancellable
Protocols/Cancellable.html.abstract: A type that represents something that can be cancelled.

Protocols/Retriable.html.name: Retriable
Protocols/Retriable.html.abstract: A type that represents something that can be retried.

Extensions/Set.html#/s:Sh8TinkLinkAA8Pro.name: all
Extensions/Set.html#/s:Sh8TinkLinkAA8Pro.abstract: A set of all providers kinds. Note that this also includes test providers.

Extensions/Set.html#/s:Sh8TinkLinkAA8Pro.name: excludingTest
Extensions/Set.html#/s:Sh8TinkLinkAA8Pro.abstract: A set of all providers kinds except for the test providers.

Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask/.name: downloadRequired(title:message:appStoreURL:)
Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask/.abstract: The UIApplication could not open the application. It is most likely missing and needs to be downloaded.

Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask..name: thirdPartyAppAuthentication
Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask..abstract: Information about how to open or download the third party application app.

Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask..name: openThirdPartyApp(with:)
Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask..abstract: Tries to open the third party app.

Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask..name: cancel()
Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask..abstract: Tells the task to stop waiting for third party app authentication.

Classes/SupplementInformationTask.html#/.name: cancel()
Classes/SupplementInformationTask.html#/.abstract: Tells the credentials to stop waiting for supplemental information.

Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.name: created(credentials:)
Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.abstract: When the credentials has just been created

Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.name: updating(credentials:status:)
Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.abstract: User has been successfully authenticated, now downloading data.

Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.name: awaitingSupplementalInformation(task:)
Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.abstract: Trigger for the client to prompt the user to fill out supplemental information.

Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.name: awaitingThirdPartyAppAuthentication(credentials:task:)
Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.abstract: Trigger for the client to prompt the user to open the third party authentication flow

Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.name: Status
Classes/RefreshCredentialTask/Status.htm.abstract: Indicates the state of a credentials being refreshed.

Classes/RefreshCredentialTask.html#/s:8T.name: shouldFailOnThirdPartyAppAuthenticationDownloadRequired
Classes/RefreshCredentialTask.html#/s:8T.abstract: Determines how the task handles the case when a user doesn’t have the required authentication app installed.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/CompletionPre.name: updating
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/CompletionPre.abstract: A predicate that indicates the credentials’ status is updating.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/CompletionPre.name: updated
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/CompletionPre.abstract: A predicate that indicates the credentials’ status is updated.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Error.html#/s.name: authenticationFailed(_:)
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Error.html#/s.abstract: The authentication failed. The payload from the backend can be found in the associated value.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Error.html#/s.name: temporaryFailure(_:)
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Error.html#/s.abstract: A temporary failure occurred. The payload from the backend can be found in the associated value.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Error.html#/s.name: permanentFailure(_:)
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Error.html#/s.abstract: A permanent failure occurred. The payload from the backend can be found in the associated value.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Status.html#/.name: updating(status:)
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Status.html#/.abstract: User has been successfully authenticated, now downloading data.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Status.html#/.name: awaitingSupplementalInformation(_:)
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Status.html#/.abstract: Trigger for the client to prompt the user to fill out supplemental information.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Status.html#/.name: awaitingThirdPartyAppAuthentication(_:)
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Status.html#/.abstract: Trigger for the client to prompt the user to open the third party authentication flow

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Status.html.name: Status
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/Status.html.abstract: Indicates the state of a credentials being added.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask/CompletionPre.name: CompletionPredicate
Classes/AddCredentialsTask/CompletionPre.abstract: Cases to evaluate when credentials status changes.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask.html#/s:8Tink.name: completionPredicate
Classes/AddCredentialsTask.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: Predicate for when credentials task is completed.

Classes/UserContext/Error.html#/s:8TinkL.name: invalidMarketOrLocale(_:)
Classes/UserContext/Error.html#/s:8TinkL.abstract: The market and/or locale was invalid. The payload from the backend can be found in the associated value.

Classes/UserContext.html#/s:8TinkLink11U.name: init(tink:)
Classes/UserContext.html#/s:8TinkLink11U.abstract: Creates a context to register for an access token that will be used in other Tink APIs.

Classes/UserContext.html#/s:8TinkLink11U.name: authenticateUser(authorizationCode:completion:)
Classes/UserContext.html#/s:8TinkLink11U.abstract: Authenticate a permanent user with authorization code.

Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html#.name: kinds
Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html#.abstract: The different kinds of providers that should be retreived.

Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html#.name: accessTypes
Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html#.abstract: The access types that should be retreived.

Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html#.name: init(capabilities:kinds:accessTypes:)
Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html#.abstract: Creates a set of attributes that is used to determine which providers should be retreived by a ProviderContext.

Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html#.name: default
Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html#.abstract: A default set of atttributes that contain all capabilities, all non-test kinds and all access types.

Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html.name: Attributes
Classes/ProviderContext/Attributes.html.abstract: Attributes representing which providers a context should access.

Classes/ProviderContext.html#/s:8TinkLin.name: init(tink:user:)
Classes/ProviderContext.html#/s:8TinkLin.abstract: Creates a context to access providers that matches the provided attributes.

Classes/CredentialsContext.html#/s:8Tink.name: init(tink:user:)
Classes/CredentialsContext.html#/s:8Tink.abstract: Creates a new CredentialsContext for the given Tink instance.

Classes/AuthorizationContext/Error.html#.name: invalidScopeOrRedirectURI(_:)
Classes/AuthorizationContext/Error.html#.abstract: The scope or redirect URI was invalid.

Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.name: init(tink:user:)
Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.abstract: Creates a context to authorize for an authorization code for a user with requested scopes.

Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.name: isAggregator(completion:)
Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.abstract: Checks if the client is the aggregator.

Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.name: scopeDescriptions(scope:completion:)
Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.abstract: Lists scope descriptions for the provided scopes.

Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.name: termsAndConditions(for:)
Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.abstract: Get a link to the Terms & Conditions for TinkLink.

Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.name: privacyPolicy(for:)
Classes/AuthorizationContext.html#/s:8Ti.abstract: Get a link to the Privacy Policy for TinkLink.

Classes/Tink/Scope/Accounts.html.name: Accounts
Classes/Tink/Scope/Accounts.html.abstract: Access to all the user’s account information, including balances.

Classes/Tink/Scope/Credentials.html.name: Credentials
Classes/Tink/Scope/Credentials.html.abstract: Access to the information describing the user’s different bank credentials connected to Tink.

Classes/Tink/Scope/Identity.html.name: Identity
Classes/Tink/Scope/Identity.html.abstract: Access to the user’s personal information that can be used for identification purposes.

Classes/Tink/Scope/Investments.html.name: Investments
Classes/Tink/Scope/Investments.html.abstract: Access to the user’s portfolios and underlying financial instruments.

Classes/Tink/Scope/Statistics.html.name: Statistics
Classes/Tink/Scope/Statistics.html.abstract: Access to all the user’s statistics, which can include filters on statistic.type.

Classes/Tink/Scope/Transactions.html.name: Transactions
Classes/Tink/Scope/Transactions.html.abstract: Access to all the user’s transactional data.

Classes/Tink/Scope/User.html.name: User
Classes/Tink/Scope/User.html.abstract: Access to user profile data such as e-mail, date of birth, etc.

Classes/Tink.html#/s:8TinkLink0A0C13conf.name: init(configuration:)
Classes/Tink.html#/s:8TinkLink0A0C13conf.abstract: Create a Tink instance with a custom configuration.

Classes/Tink.html#/s:8TinkLink0A0C4open_.name: open(_:completion:)
Classes/Tink.html#/s:8TinkLink0A0C4open_.abstract: For some providers the redirect needs to be a https link. Use the continue user activity method in your UIApplicationDelegate to let TinkLink send the information to Tink if needed.

Classes/Tink/Configuration.html.name: Configuration
Classes/Tink/Configuration.html.abstract: Configuration used to set up the TinkLink

Classes/Tink.html#/s:8TinkLink0A0C13defa.name: defaultLocale
Classes/Tink.html#/s:8TinkLink0A0C13defa.abstract: Default available locale that will be used based on the current locale

Classes/Tink/Scope.html.name: Scope
Classes/Tink/Scope.html.abstract: Access to Tink is divided into scopes. The available scopes for Tink’s APIs can be found in Tink console

Classes/Tink.html.name: Tink
Classes/Tink.html.abstract: The Tink class encapsulates a connection to the Tink API.

Classes/AuthorizationContext.html.name: AuthorizationContext
Classes/AuthorizationContext.html.abstract: An object that you use to authorize for a user with requested scopes.

Classes/CredentialsContext.html.name: CredentialsContext
Classes/CredentialsContext.html.abstract: An object that you use to access the user’s credentials and supports the flow for adding credentials.

Classes/ProviderContext.html.name: ProviderContext
Classes/ProviderContext.html.abstract: An object that accesses providers for a specific market and supports the grouping of providers.

Classes/UserContext.html.name: UserContext
Classes/UserContext.html.abstract: An object that you use to create a user that will be used in other Tink APIs.

Classes/AddCredentialsTask.html.name: AddCredentialsTask
Classes/AddCredentialsTask.html.abstract: A task that manages progress of adding a credential.

Classes/RefreshCredentialTask.html.name: RefreshCredentialTask
Classes/RefreshCredentialTask.html.abstract: A task that manages progress of refreshing a credential.

Classes/SupplementInformationTask.html.name: SupplementInformationTask
Classes/SupplementInformationTask.html.abstract: A task that handles submitting supplemental information for a credentials.

Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask..name: ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask
Classes/ThirdPartyAppAuthenticationTask..abstract: A task that handles opening third party apps.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
